original: mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na /
analyzed: mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na /
translated: and in the end you will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: koo shi ka rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Kauśika, this son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
translated: this daughter of a good family would create a lot more merit.”🔽“Kauśika, suppose all the sentient beings in a four-continent world-system,🔽all the sentient beings in a world-system with a triple-thousand great one-thousand worlds,

original: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang /
analyzed: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang /
translated: and all the sentient beings in the world-systems in the ten directions, as many as there are, were each individually to establish all those sentient beings in the irreversible stage.

original: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa bas /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa bas /
translated: “Kauśika, suppose a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to fill as many world-systems as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River in the ten directions with relics of the Tathāgata after the Tathāgata’s passing into nirvāṇa and were to set up stūpas for them, and were to honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to them with divine flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners.

original: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
translated: “Kauśika, suppose a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family were to set up a stūpa for the Tathāgata that is made of the seven precious substances and were to honor, venerate, respect, and make offerings to it with divine flowers, incense, perfume, garlands, ointments, powders, cloth, parasols, flags, and banners.

original: yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa'i bar dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig / kun chub bar gyis shig / chongs shig / lhogs shig / tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa'i bar dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zung shig / kun chub bar gyis shig / chongs shig / lhogs shig / tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig / ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
translated: and you should practice the perfection of wisdom as it has been taught.

original: phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / khyod kyis 'di la nan tan du byas na phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig / khyod kyis 'di la nan tan du byas na phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur te /
translated: If you practice it, you will stand on the irreversible level,

original: mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na /
analyzed: mthar gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo na /
translated: and in the end you will fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’

original: 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //
translated: This one would generate much more merit than that.

original: koo shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @109a * //🔽byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu bkod de /🔽de dag la rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: koo shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @109a * // byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa la rab tu bkod de / de dag la rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Furthermore, Kauśika, suppose that all the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa were established in irreversible progress toward unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
translated: and that some son of enlightened heritage or daughter of enlightened heritage were to teach this transcendent perfection of wisdom to them, explaining its meaning and explaining its letters,🔽and were to reveal it, make it clear, make it intelligible, and unambiguously reveal it,🔽and that some among them were to say, ‘I will be the first to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the second to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the third to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’

original: yi ge dang ldan par bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / rnam par bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste yang dag par bstan pa bas de rnams kyi nang nas la la zhig bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / rnam par bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste yang dag par bstan pa bas de rnams kyi nang nas la la zhig bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and that some were to say, ‘I will be the fourth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the fifth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the sixth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the seventh to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the eighth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the ninth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the tenth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the eleventh to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the twelfth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the thirteenth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the fourteenth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the fifteenth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment,’🔽and that some were to say, ‘I will be the sixteenth to attain manifestly perfect buddhahood

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya cher don dang ldan /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya cher don dang ldan /
translated: “If some son or daughter of good family were to teach this perfection of wisdom extensively, with its meaning,

original: yi ge dang ldan par nye bar ston cing yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed /
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par nye bar ston cing yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byed /
translated: with its letters, were to illuminate it correctly,

original: rnam par 'grel par byed /
analyzed: rnam par 'grel par byed /
translated: were to explain it,

original: rnam par phye ste yang dag par ston par byed na 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo //🔽phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rnam par phye ste yang dag par ston par byed na 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo // phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: were to reveal it correctly, then this would have a much greater increase in merit than that.

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i la bkod de /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi ldog pa'i la bkod de /
translated: “If some son or daughter of good family were to establish as many sentient beings as there are in the world systems in the ten directions, as many as there are sand particles in the Gaṅgā River, in the irreversible state,

original: de dag la la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa bas de rnams kyi nang nas la la zhig 'di skad du bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang🔽rgya'o zhes zer na /
analyzed: de dag la la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa bas de rnams kyi nang nas la la zhig 'di skad du bdag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer na /
translated: If someone were to teach this perfection of wisdom to some of them, and someone else were to say to them, ‘I will quickly fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,’

original: la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
analyzed: la la zhig gis de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan /
translated: if someone were to teach this perfection of wisdom to them,🔽expounding its meaning,

original: yi ge dang ldan par nye bar bstan /🔽yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byas /
analyzed: yi ge dang ldan par nye bar bstan / yang dag par rab tu gsal bar byas /
translated: expounding its letters,🔽expounding it correctly,

original: rnam par bkrol /
analyzed: rnam par bkrol /
translated: expounding it in detail,

original: rnam par phye ste /
analyzed: rnam par phye ste /
translated: expounding it in analysis,🔽expounding it in elucidation,

original: rnam par bshad cing yang dag par bstan par byas na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: rnam par bshad cing yang dag par bstan par byas na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: then this would be the greater one of the two in terms of merit.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir na /
translated: Because those irreversible bodhisattvas are certain to attain perfect awakening and will not turn back from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi /
analyzed: de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not necessary to teach the Dharma to them to that extent.

original: 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la /
analyzed: 'di ni 'khor ba las 'byung bar 'dod la /
translated: This one desires to emerge from cyclic existence,🔽because he is tormented by great compassion.

original: snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsngags pa tsam dgu pa yin te /
analyzed: snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsngags pa tsam dgu pa yin te /
translated: This is the ninth mere praise.

original: 'di dag gis ni bsngags pa gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag gis ni bsngags pa gsungs pa yin no //
translated: With these, the praises are stated.

original: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: brgya byin gyis gsol pa /
translated: Śatakratu then said,

original: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par @109b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par @109b rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
translated: “Blessed One, to the extent that bodhisattva great beings approach unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, to that extent bodhisattva great beings approach the perfection of wisdom.

original: pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them in the perfection of concentration,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, and the perfection of generosity.

original: stong pa nyid thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: I will instruct and teach them in all the emptinesses.🔽I will instruct and teach them in the applications of mindfulness,

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the path.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: the immeasurables, the dhyānas, the formless absorptions, the noble truths, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, and the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o //
translated: all the meditative stabilities, all the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of the buddhas.

original: gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dang / zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and with robes, alms-food, bedding and seats, medicines for sicknesses, and implements,🔽this son of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid kyi bsod nams de ni de bas ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid kyi bsod nams de ni de bas ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: this daughter of a good family who looks after the bodhisattva great beings with the attraction of Dharma and with material things will have much more merit increase than that.

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: Blessed One, it is because it is like this:

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: those who are bodhisattva great beings are the instruction and the teaching of the perfections,

original: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms @110a * //
analyzed: stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms @110a * //
translated: of the emptinesses, of the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, of the immeasurables, of the concentrations, of the formless absorptions,

original: bar 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: bar 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the three concentrations, the three types of emptiness, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the five clairvoyances, the ten powers of a great being, the four forms of fearlessness, the four special forms of knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the Buddha.🔽

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o //
translated: the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts, the legs of miraculous power, the faculties, the powers, the seven branches of enlightenment, the noble eightfold path, the three gateways to liberation, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four unhindered discernments, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa /🔽koo shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa / koo shi ka de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Then the venerable Su­bhūti addressed Śakra, mighty king of the gods:

original: rigs kyi bu mo 'di rnams la mos pa bskyed pa legs so legs so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo 'di rnams la mos pa bskyed pa legs so legs so //
translated: “Kauśika, you have done well to generate such interest in these sons of enlightened heritage or daughters of enlightened heritage who follow the vehicle of the bodhisattvas.

original: khyed kyis de bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: khyed kyis de bzhin du bya'o //
translated: You should continue to do so!

original: 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: “Noble disciples who wish to benefit beings should support the bodhisattva mahāsattvas.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o //
translated: They should arouse the aspiration for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: zang zing dang chos kyis phan 'dogs shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zang zing dang chos kyis phan 'dogs shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o //
translated: They should support and care for them with material gifts and the gift of the Dharma.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di las bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / 'di las rang sangs rgyas dang / 'di las theg pa chen po rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di las bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / 'di las rang sangs rgyas dang / 'di las theg pa chen po rnams 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because from them come the bhagavān’s śrāvaka saṅgha, from them come the pratyekabuddhas, and from them come the followers of the Mahāyāna.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na ni /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par ma gyur na ni /
translated: If the bodhisattva mahāsattvas had not aroused the mind set on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di la slob par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di la slob par mi 'gyur /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattvas would not train in these six perfections.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, the noble truths, the eight aspects of liberation, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the immeasurable aspirations, the meditative concentrations, the formless meditative absorptions,

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /
translated: emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the levels of deeper discernment, and inner emptiness, outer emptiness, and the rest up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @110b stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i @110b stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: They will not train in the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, or the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: chos de rnams la ma bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos de rnams la ma bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If they do not train in those dharmas, they will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / nyan thos kyi byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na de'i tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / nyan thos kyi byang chub kyang yod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If they do not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, then at that time unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, the awakening of a pratyekabuddha, and the awakening of a śrāvaka will not exist.

original: koo shi ka gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: koo shi ka gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: all the emptinesses, all the dhāraṇī gateways, emptiness,🔽signlessness, and wishlessness,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, the noble truths, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions,

original: mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / chos thams cad kyi bar la yang slob pa des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te /🔽'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun 'chad do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / chos thams cad kyi bar la yang slob pa des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yin te / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun 'chad do //
translated: He trains in the ten powers of the Tathāgata, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, up to he trains in all dharmas.

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye gnas rnams rgyun 'chad do //🔽rgyal rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo //🔽bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi skye gnas rnams rgyun 'chad do // rgyal rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo // bram ze'i rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: In all world systems the hells are stopped, the animal world is stopped, and the world of Yama is stopped.

original: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
analyzed: khyim bdag gi rigs s'a la chen po rnams 'byung ngo //
translated: The kṣatriya Mahāsalas appear, the brahmin Mahāsalas appear, the householder Mahāsalas appear,🔽and the royal cities of the Cāturmahārājakāyikas, the Trāyastriṃśas, the Yāmas, the Tuṣitas, the Nirmāṇaratis, and the Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartins appear.

original: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'byung ngo //🔽sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad @111a * //
analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'byung ngo // sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad @111a * //
translated: The gods of the Four Great Kings appear.🔽The gods of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇarati gods, the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods, the Brahmakāyika gods, the Brahmapurohita gods, the Mahābrahma gods, the Parīttābha gods, the Apramāṇābha gods, the Ābhāsvara gods, the Parīttaśubha gods, the Apramāṇaśubha gods, the Śubhakṛtsna gods, the Anabhraka gods, the Puṇyaprasava gods, the Brhatphala gods, the Śuddhāvāsa gods, the Avṛha gods, the Atapa gods,🔽the Sudṛśa gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Avṛha gods, the Atapa gods,

original: med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang /
analyzed: med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che dang / gnas gtsang ma dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang /
translated: the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Śuddhāvāsa gods, the Atapa gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha gods, the Sudarśana gods, the Akaniṣṭha

original: legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min pa rnams dang ; nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: legs mthong dang / rab lta dang / 'og min pa rnams dang ; nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: the gods of the Heaven of Excellent Vision, the gods of the Heaven of Excellent Vision of the Pure Abodes, the gods of the Heaven of No Hardship, the gods of the Sphere of Infinite Space, the gods of the Sphere of Infinite Consciousness, and the gods of the Sphere of Neither Perception nor Non-Perception appear in the world.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The perfection of generosity appears in the world.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //🔽bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The perfection of moral discipline appears in the world.🔽The perfection of patience appears in the world.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The perfection of perseverance appears in the world.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The perfection of concentration appears in the world.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The perfection of wisdom appears in the world.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment and the four noble truths appear in the world.

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ; rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang ; rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: The immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: and wishlessness, and the higher knowledges appear in the world.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: All the meditative stabilizations, all the dhāraṇī gateways, and the bodhisattva levels appear in the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: the ten powers of the Tathagata, the four grounds of self-confidence, the four analytical knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen special qualities of the Buddhas appear in the world.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //
translated: The knowledge of all modes appears in the world.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am /
translated: The vehicle of the Disciples,🔽the vehicle of the Bodhisattvas, and the Great Vehicle appear in the world.

original: theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba yin no //
analyzed: theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni bstod pa la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba yin no //
translated: This is the summary of the praise, etc.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa /
translated: Then the Bodhisattva and Mahasattva Maitreya said to the Elder Subhuti:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor @111b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor @111b byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: Venerable Subhūti, the merit of the bodhisattva great beings’ rejoicing is shared with all sentient beings,

original: de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
analyzed: de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
translated: and that is dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, using a method that does not apprehend anything.

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: The merit of generosity, the merit of morality, and the merit of meditation of those who have entered the vehicle of the disciples and of those who have entered the vehicle of the Solitary Buddhas, the Bodhisattva, the great being, having rejoiced in all those wholesome roots, should dedicate the merit, which is shared by all living beings, to supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di nyid rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di nyid rab ces bya'o //
translated: This very dedication is called the best,

original: dam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the highest,

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //🔽mchog ces bya'o //🔽rab mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o // rab mchog ces bya'o //
translated: it is called the foremost,🔽it is called the most excellent,

original: phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the most sublime,🔽it is called the unequalled,🔽it is called the matchless,

original: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the unsurpassed,🔽it is called the unequalled.

original: mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called “unequaled.”

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called “equal to the unequalled.”

original: zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can yin no /🔽// / bam po sum cu lnga pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can yin no / // / bam po sum cu lnga pa /
translated: This is the special dedication.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it so?

original: 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag dul ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag thams cad bdag dul ba dang /
translated: Because all the bases of meritorious deeds that arise from generosity, moral discipline, and meditation of those in the vehicles of the hearers and solitary buddhas are present for the sake of taming oneself,

original: bdag zhi ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste /
analyzed: bdag zhi ba dang / bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste /
translated: pacifying oneself, and passing into parinirvāṇa for oneself.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ji snyed yod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ji snyed yod pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: All the thirty-seven aspects of the path to enlightenment, as many as there are, and the emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, the four noble truths, the immeasurables, the concentrations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug kyang bdag kyang bdag dul ba dang /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug kyang bdag kyang bdag dul ba dang /
translated: the formless meditative stabilizations, the eight liberations, the nine serial absorptions, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the six clairvoyances are present for the sake of taming oneself,

original: bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / @112a * //
analyzed: bdag zhi bar bya ba dang / @112a * //
translated: pacifying oneself,

original: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi /🔽byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad dul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi / byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad dul ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and passing into Nirvāṇa.🔽But bodhisattvas, having made the wholesome roots that are the basis of the merit of rejoicing common to all sentient beings, dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment, without apprehending the three circles.

original: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba ni yongs su bsngo
translated: This is the dedication.

original: ba'i byed pa yin no //
analyzed: ba'i byed pa yin no //
translated: This is the function of the perfection of wisdom.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the bodhisattva mahāsattva Maitreya:

original: byams pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / mtshams rnams dang /
analyzed: byams pa gang yang byang chub sems dpa' 'dis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs rnams dang / mtshams rnams dang /
translated: “Maitreya, this bodhisattva has seen the infinite, countless, immeasurable blessed buddhas in the eastern direction, and similarly in the south, west, and north, in the intermediate directions,

original: 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
analyzed: 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
translated: below and above, in each direction’s immeasurable, countless, infinite blessed buddhas who have passed into parinirvāṇa, from their first arousal of the mind of awakening up to🔽their unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, up to their unsurpassed, perfect, complete buddha qualities, up to their turning the wheel of the Dharma, up to their teaching the Dharma, up to their parinirvāṇa, up to the duration of their teachings, up to the disciples of those buddhas, up to the solitary buddhas, up to the hearers, up to the bodhisattvas, up to the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kinnaras, and mahoragas, up to the humans and nonhumans, up to the entire world of beings.

original: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
analyzed: par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa'i bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /
translated: from the time they first gave rise to bodhicitta up until they fully awakened to supreme, perfect enlightenment, up until they passed into parinirvāṇa in the realm of nirvāṇa without any aggregates remaining, and up until the period when the sublime Dharma has not yet disappeared, and

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa dang /
translated: all the roots of virtue that are endowed with the six perfections of those who are followers of the Hearers’ Vehicle, those who are followers of the Solitary Realizers’ Vehicle, and the bases of meritorious activity that consist of generosity, ethical discipline, and meditation,

original: slob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
analyzed: slob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
translated: the roots of virtue of those in training that are uncontaminated, the aggregate of discipline, the aggregate of meditative stabilization, the aggregate of wisdom, the aggregate of liberation, and the aggregate of the wisdom of liberation of those thus-gone ones,

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med gzhal du med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: their desire to benefit, their great love, their great compassion, and their immeasurable, incalculable, and innumerable buddha qualities,

original: sangs rgyas @112b bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa gang yin pa dang / chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas @112b bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa gang yin pa dang / chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /
translated: the Dharma that those lord buddhas have taught, and those who have trained in that Dharma and attained the result of stream enterer, attained the result of once-returner, attained the result of non-returner,🔽attained the state of a worthy one, attained a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, and entered into the secure state of a bodhisattva,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung /🔽yongs su mya mya ngan 'das kyang rung /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya mya ngan 'das kyang rung /
translated: and whatever wholesome roots there are in those who have generated wholesome roots in relation to those tathāgatas, whether they are present or have passed into parinirvāṇa,🔽all those wholesome roots gathered together🔽are rejoiced in

original: de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te /
analyzed: de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te /
translated: with the best,

original: rjes su yi rang ba rab /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba rab /
translated: the highest,

original: dam pa / gtso bo //🔽mchod phul du phyin pa /🔽gong na med pa /
analyzed: dam pa / gtso bo // mchod phul du phyin pa / gong na med pa /
translated: the utmost,🔽the unsurpassed,

original: mnyam pa med pa /
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa /
translated: the unequalled,

original: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ba ste /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ba ste /
translated: The rejoicing is unequalled, and equal to the unequalled.

original: de ltar rjes su yi rangs nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsgrub par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang🔽dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rjes su yi rangs nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsgrub par gyur cig ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus rejoiced, he should dedicate the wholesome roots associated with the rejoicing to unsurpassed true and complete enlightenment, making them common to all sentient beings.

original: gang yang theg pa chen po pa 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bur yongs su bsngo bar bya na dmigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang dag gis sems de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du yod dam /
analyzed: gang yang theg pa chen po pa 'dis sems can gyi rnam pa de lta bur yongs su bsngo bar bya na dmigs pa gang dang / dngos po gang dag gis sems de bskyed pa'i dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du yod dam /
translated: If those who belong to the Great Vehicle should dedicate in this way, then with regard to the objective supports and entities by means of which that thought is generated, do those objective supports and entities exist in just the way that those sons of good family who belong to the Great Vehicle have mentally constructed them?

original: de bzhin du dmigs sam /
analyzed: de bzhin du dmigs sam /
translated: Are they perceived in just that way?

original: byams pas smras pa /
analyzed: byams pas smras pa /
translated: Maitreya replied:

original: btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang dmigs pa de dag dmigs su
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du dngos po de dag dang dmigs pa de dag dmigs su
translated: Venerable Subhūti, those sons of good family in the Great Vehicle, having made those things and those objects of perception into signs, have dedicated them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Those things and those objects of perception do not exist as they have been dedicated.

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: gal te de ltar dngos po med pa dang / dmigs su med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar dngos po med pa dang / dmigs su med pa yin na /
translated: “If it is like that, if things do not exist and are not objects of perception,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gi yang thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gi yang thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /
translated: then the thoughts of the lord buddhas dwelling, living, and teaching in the world systems of the ten directions, from their first production of the thought of awakening up to their manifest complete buddhahood in unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi @113a * //
analyzed: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi @113a * //
translated: and from the time when the holy Dharma remains until the time when it disappears,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i gang zag de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa rnams dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa ba'i gang zag de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa rnams dang /
translated: all the roots of virtue of those individuals who are followers of the Hearers’ Vehicle, all the roots of virtue of those individuals who are followers of the Solitary Realizers’ Vehicle,🔽all the roots of virtue of those in training, and all the roots of virtue of those beyond training,

original: slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rjes su yi rangs nas /
analyzed: slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang / mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te rjes su yi rangs nas /
translated: having rejoiced in them all together,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan mar byas shing mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mtshan mar byas shing mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo na /
translated: if they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect and complete awakening, taking them as a causal sign and in a manner of taking them as a causal sign,

original: mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde ba zhes bya ba dang bdag med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde ba zhes bya ba dang bdag med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang /
translated: “Are you mistaken in your perception, mind, and view, thinking that what is impermanent is permanent,🔽that what is suffering is happiness, and that what is without self has a self?

original: zhi ba la ma zhi zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de lta de ltar de'i phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam /
analyzed: zhi ba la ma zhi zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de lta de ltar de'i phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam /
translated: Are you mistaken in your perception, mind, and view, thinking that what is not peaceful is peaceful?

original: de ste dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: de ste dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyang de bzhin /
translated: If so, then just as things are and just as objects are, awakening is also like that.

original: sems kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: sems kyang de bzhin /
translated: The mind is also like that.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin /
translated: the perfection of generosity, the perfection of moral discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative stabilization, and the perfection of wisdom are also like that;

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang de bzhin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang de bzhin /
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are also like that;

original: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: the immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, and the noble truths are also like that;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang de bzhin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang de bzhin /
translated: inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness are also like that;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang de bzhin /
translated: the eight liberations are also like that;

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin /
translated: The nine serial absorptions are also like that.

original: mngon par shes pa drug kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa drug kyang de bzhin /
translated: The six clairvoyances are also like that.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de bzhin /
translated: All the meditative stabilizations are also like that.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are also like that.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are also like that.

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: The fearlessnesses are also like that.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: The detailed and thorough knowledges are also like that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are also like that.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin @113b no ;
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin @113b no ;
translated: Omniscience is also like that.

original: / gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: / gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang / dmigs pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin /
translated: If things are like that, and if awakening is also like that,

original: sems kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: sems kyang de bzhin /
translated: and if the mind is also like that,

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin /
translated: and if form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are also like that,

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the emptiness of internal phenomena and the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, and the path.

original: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the immeasurables, the concentrations, and the formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the eight aspects of liberation and the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the three gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa yang de bzhin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with all the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang de bzhin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang de bzhin /
translated: It is the same with all the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang de bzhin /
translated: The ten powers of the tathāgatas are also like that.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang de bzhin /
translated: The four fearlessnesses are also like that.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang de bzhin /
translated: The four detailed and thorough knowledges are also like that.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin na /
translated: The eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are also like that.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i dngos po ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i dngos po ni gang zhig yin /
translated: Then what is the thing that is to be dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: dmigs pa ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the object?

original: byang chub ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: byang chub ni gang zhig yin /
translated: What is awakening?

original: sems ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: sems ni gang zhig yin /
translated: What is the mind?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang zhig yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang zhig yin /
translated: What are the roots of virtue?

original: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni gang zhig yin /🔽byams pas smras pa /
analyzed: rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni gang zhig yin / byams pas smras pa /
translated: What is the thing that is the merit of rejoicing?

original: btsun pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par 'gyur /
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par 'gyur /
translated: Maitreya answered, “Venerable Subhūti, if bodhisattvas practice the six perfections,

original: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur /
translated: they will serve many buddhas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur /
translated: they will plant wholesome roots,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur /
translated: They will be taken care of by spiritual friends.🔽They will train in all phenomena that are empty of their own marks.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la slob par 'gyur ba ni dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @114a * //🔽tu yongs su bsngo bar mi 'gyur gyi /🔽ji ltar gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la slob par 'gyur ba ni dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub @114a * // tu yongs su bsngo bar mi 'gyur gyi / ji ltar gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They will not dedicate those things, those objects, those blessed buddhas, those wholesome roots, and that basis of merit that is connected with rejoicing to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by apprehending them as marks.🔽They will not dedicate them by way of duality.

original: gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They will not dedicate them by way of nonduality.🔽They will not dedicate them by way of marks.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They will not dedicate them by way of the absence of marks.🔽They will not dedicate them by way of objects.

original: dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They will not dedicate them by way of the absence of objects.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: They will not dedicate them by way of the absence of affliction.

original: rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: not by the method of purification,

original: skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: not by the method of arising,

original: 'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa de ltar yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: not by the method of cessation.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par gyur pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod par gyur pa yang ma yin /
translated: If those bodhisattvas have not practiced the six perfections,

original: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bar gyur pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bar gyur pa yang ma yin /
translated: have not served many buddhas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa yang ma yin /
translated: have not generated roots of virtue,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par gyur pa yang ma yin /
translated: have not been assisted by spiritual friends,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la slob par gyur pa yang ma yin na /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams la slob par gyur pa yang ma yin na /
translated: and have not trained in the Dharma that is empty of intrinsic characteristics,

original: dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: They will make signs of those things, of those objects, of those Lord Buddhas, of those wholesome roots, and of those thoughts of generation of the resolve accompanied by rejoicing, and will dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment.

original: btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: “Venerable Subhūti, this teaching of the perfection of wisdom should not be expounded in the presence of a bodhisattva who has newly set out in the vehicle.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Similarly, it should not be expounded in the presence of a bodhisattva who has newly set out in the vehicle for the perfection of concentration, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of morality, or the perfection of giving.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par mi bya'o //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar bstan pa ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par mi bya'o //
translated: The emptiness of internal phenomena, and the other aspects of emptiness, up to and including the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, should not be explained in the presence of bodhisattva great beings who are beginners.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni de la dad pa tsam mam /
analyzed: de ni de la dad pa tsam mam /
translated: Because the mere faith,

original: rab tu dang ba tsam mam /
analyzed: rab tu dang ba tsam mam /
translated: the mere clarity,

original: dga' ba tsam mam /
analyzed: dga' ba tsam mam /
translated: the mere joy,

original: gus pa tsam zhig yod pa gang yin pa de yang med par gyur pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gus pa tsam zhig yod pa gang yin pa de yang med par gyur pa'i phyir te /
translated: and the mere respect that they have will disappear.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad par bya'o //
translated: But it should be explained in the presence of bodhisattva great beings who are irreversible.

original: bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: bstan par bya'o //
translated: It should be taught.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bstan par bya bar bshad pa ste /
