analyzed: gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams nyid lung bstan pa dang / der lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu btul zhing bsnyams te /
translated: and also the gods, nagas, yakshas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kinnaras, and mahoragas who have planted wholesome roots,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces bya bar ston te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces bya bar ston te /
translated: and dedicate it all to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul dang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo na dug tu 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul dang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo na dug tu 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: If you dedicate in that way, with a sign as a method and an object as a method, it becomes poison.

original: 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: It is like this:🔽it is like food with poison in it.

original: zas dug can de dang 'dra na dmigs pa'i tshul 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do //
analyzed: zas dug can de dang 'dra na dmigs pa'i tshul 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do //
translated: There is no dedication for those who have an object as a method and have perception.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: dmigs pa ni dug can dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa ni dug can dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa /
translated: An object is poisonous, with a sign.

original: rgyu dang bcas pa /
analyzed: rgyu dang bcas pa /
translated: because it is accompanied by causes

original: rkyen dang bcas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rkyen dang bcas pa'i phyir te /
translated: and accompanied by conditions.

original: gang de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gang de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas bshad par mi 'gyur te /
translated: One who dedicates in that way is not explained by the Tathāgata,

original: de bzhin @120b gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba ma yin /
analyzed: de bzhin @120b gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba ma yin /
translated: does not speak in accordance with what is taught by the Tathāgata,

original: chos bzhin du smra bar mi 'gyur te /🔽de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: chos bzhin du smra bar mi 'gyur te / de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and does not speak in accordance with the Dharma.🔽Therefore, sons of good family or daughters of good family in the Bodhisattva Vehicle should not train in that way.”

original: rigs kyi bu mos de ltar bslab par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mos de ltar bslab par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
translated: This is the dedication without signs.

original: byams pas smras pa /🔽ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ba yongs su bsngo bar bya /
analyzed: byams pas smras pa / ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ba yongs su bsngo bar bya /
translated: Maitreya said,🔽“How should one rejoice in and dedicate the wholesome roots of the past, future, and present Lord Buddhas?

original: ji ltar na thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: ji ltar na thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: How should one, beginning from the first production of the thought of enlightenment,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de /
translated: and from the time they fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening up to the time they pass into the realm of nirvāṇa without any remainder of the skandhas, and from the time the true Dharma of the śrāvaka saṅgha disappears, they should practice the perfection of wisdom.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bar dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'i bar dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
translated: Whatever roots of virtue they have created, up to the time they attain the knowledge of all aspects, and whatever roots of virtue gods, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas,

original: mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang ste yongs su bsngo bar bya /
analyzed: mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang ste yongs su bsngo bar bya /
translated: kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, and nonhumans have created, they should rejoice in all those roots of virtue and dedicate them.

original: ji ltar yongs su bsngos na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin /
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su bsngos na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin /
translated: How is it that they dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening?

original: rab 'byor gyis smras pa /🔽'di ltar theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis smras pa / 'di ltar theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs pa ma yin par 'dod pas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs pa ma yin par 'dod pas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: “Thus, sons of a good family or daughters of a good family in the Great Vehicle who practice the perfection of wisdom should dedicate in this way, not thinking that the Tathāgata did not speak.

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi rigs gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa mkhyen cing chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi rigs gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa mkhyen cing chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: They should dedicate in this way: ‘Just as those tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas, with unsurpassed buddha knowledge, know the kind of wholesome roots, the nature of wholesome roots, and the characteristics of wholesome roots, and just as they know the reality by which they exist, in just that way I rejoice.

original: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar theg pa chen po pa'i rigs @121a * //
analyzed: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar theg pa chen po pa'i rigs @121a * //
translated: Just as those Blessed Buddhas have understood, in the same way I dedicate these roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: In this way, sons and daughters of the lineage in the Great Vehicle should dedicate those roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: de ltar yongs su bsngo na de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs ba ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba dang / chos bzhin du smra ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngo na de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs ba ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba dang / chos bzhin du smra ba yin no //
translated: If they dedicate in this way, they are not speaking contrary to what the Tathāgata has said, they are speaking in accordance with what the Tathāgata has said, they are speaking in accordance with the Dharma.

original: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba de dug med pa yin no zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba de dug med pa yin no zhes bya ba na sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang ba'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
translated: In this way, the dedication of bodhisattva great beings is without poison.

original: gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /🔽rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am / rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: a daughter of good lineage who has set out in the Great Vehicle,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: when practicing the perfection of wisdom, should dedicate those wholesome roots in the following manner:

original: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa /
translated: Just as the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm are not included,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: in the same way, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The elements, the sense spheres, and dependent origination are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /
translated: Similarly, the perfection of meditative stability, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of patience, the perfection of moral discipline, and the perfection of generosity are not included in the desire realm,🔽the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
translated: They are not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: not future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
translated: and not present.

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: Similarly, the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, and so forth up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: tshad med @121b pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: tshad med @121b pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions, and the noble truths are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The eight liberations and the nine serial absorptions are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: Emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and the six superknowledges are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways and the meditative absorptions are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: The ten powers, the four forms of fearlessness, the four forms of correct knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of a buddha are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
translated: the establishment of dharmas,🔽the certification of dharmas,🔽the very limit of reality,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: and the inconceivable expanse are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.🔽Morality, meditative stabilization, wisdom,🔽liberation,🔽the knowledge and seeing of liberation,🔽the knowledge of all aspects,

original: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /
translated: the dharmatā that is not forgetful,🔽and the constant abiding in equanimity are not included in the desire realm,🔽the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs te gang ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs te gang ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
translated: What is not included is not past,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: is not future,🔽and is not present.

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not in the present.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: ji ltar de dag ma gtogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ji ltar de dag ma gtogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it is not included in any of those.

original: de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs /
analyzed: de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs /
translated: In the same way, the dedication is not included,

original: chos gang du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i chos de yang ma gtogs /
analyzed: chos gang du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i chos de yang ma gtogs /
translated: nor is the phenomenon in which the dedication is made included,

original: gang yongs su bsngo ba de yang ma gtogs /
analyzed: gang yongs su bsngo ba de yang ma gtogs /
translated: nor is the one who makes the dedication included.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med @122a * //🔽pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med @122a * // pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: Those blessed buddhas are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: Those wholesome roots are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: nyan thos de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: nyan thos de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: Those śrāvakas and those pratyekabuddhas are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs te /
analyzed: de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs te /
translated: Those wholesome roots are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm.

original: gang ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin /🔽ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
analyzed: gang ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin / ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin /
translated: What is not included is not past,🔽not future,

original: da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no //
translated: and not present.

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: If, when a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: gzugs gang yin pa de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa /
analyzed: gzugs gang yin pa de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa /
translated: form is not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm,

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: and likewise, if feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm,

original: de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag rnams 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa yin la /
translated: and likewise, if the constituents, the sense fields, and the links of dependent origination are not included in the desire realm, the form realm, or the formless realm,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: If, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,🔽

original: gzugs gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs gang 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /
translated: If, when great bodhisattva beings practice the transcendent perfection of wisdom, they were to apprehend form as not included within the realms of desire, form, and the formless,

original: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: it would not be past,🔽it would not be future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin te /🔽de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin te / de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
translated: and it would not be present.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: It would not be possible to make a dedication by means of a causal process🔽or by means of an objective mental construct.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because it has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature is a non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: A non-entity cannot dedicate a non-entity.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang / de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: Similarly, it is the same for feelings, perceptions, formative predispositions, and consciousness; the elements; the sense fields; the limbs of dependent origination; and similarly, the transcendent perfection of generosity,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @122b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan @122b gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance, the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, and the transcendent perfection of wisdom;

original: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ji snyed pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ji snyed pa dang /
translated: and similarly, it is the same for all the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment, from the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, and the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities;

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar ba brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug po rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug po rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: wishlessness, the six clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gang 'dod pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gang 'dod pa'i khams su ma gtogs /
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, the knowledge of all aspects, the nature of being without forgetfulness, and the constant state of equanimity are not included in the desire realm,

original: gzugs kyi khams su ma gtogs /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su ma gtogs /
translated: are not included in the form realm,🔽and

original: gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin /🔽ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams su ma gtogs pa de ni 'das pa ma yin / ma 'ongs pa ma yin /
translated: It is not included in the formless realm.🔽It is not past,🔽not future,

original: da ltar byung ba ma yin te /🔽de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma yin te / de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
translated: not present.🔽It cannot be dedicated by way of a causal sign

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so //
translated: or by way of an objective support.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has no intrinsic nature.

original: gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste /
translated: That which has no intrinsic nature is a non-entity.🔽A non-entity cannot dedicate a non-entity.

original: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so zhes de ltar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba dug med pa yin no //🔽yang theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so zhes de ltar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba dug med pa yin no // yang theg pa chen po pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: If one knows it in this way, the dedication of a bodhisattva great being is free of poison.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang mtshan ma'i tshul lam /
translated: Moreover, if a son or daughter of good family in the Great Vehicle

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na /
translated: dedicates those wholesome roots by way of a causal sign🔽or by way of an objective support,

original: de lta bu'i yongs su bsngo ba ni log par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta bu'i yongs su bsngo ba ni log par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi /
translated: such a dedication is a mistaken dedication.

original: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a true dedication.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad do //
translated: It is not praised by the Blessed Buddhas.

original: gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad pa'i yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags pa ma mdzad pa'i yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te /
translated: That dedication which is not praised by the Blessed Buddhas is not a dedication.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of morality.

original: @123a * // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: @123a * // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of meditation.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: It is not a dedication of the perfection of wisdom.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The six perfections will not be completed.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening will not be completed.

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
translated: the emptiness of internal phenomena, the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, the immeasurables, the concentrations, the formless absorptions,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
translated: the noble truths, the eight deliverances, the nine serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, and the clairvoyances,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro /🔽// / bam po sum cu drug pa /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro / // / bam po sum cu drug pa /
translated: the meditative stabilities, the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas will not be perfected.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not purify a buddhafield.

original: sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not bring beings to maturity.

original: gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur ba de ni bal na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma gyur ba de ni bal na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Those who have not purified a buddhafield and have not brought beings to maturity will not fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why is that?

original: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because such a dedication is poisoned.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, when a bodhisattva great being practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste /
translated: he should investigate as follows:

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: “In this way, by the reality of those Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, I should dedicate those wholesome roots.🔽If I dedicate in this way, it will be a dedication.”

original: de ltar yongs su bsngos na yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngos na yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o
translated: In this way, he should investigate: “In the same way that they have understood, ‘In this way, by that reality, I should dedicate to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.’ ”

original: zhes bya ba @123b ni khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba @123b ni khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin no //
translated: This is the dedication that is not included in the three realms.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Lord said to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
translated: “Excellent, Subhūti, excellent!

original: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po gang yin pa mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po gang yin pa mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang / skye ba med pa'i tshul dang / 'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /
translated: by way of the absence of production, by way of the absence of stopping, by way of the absence of defilement,

original: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /
translated: by way of the absence of purification, by way of the nature of the absence of entity, by way of the emptiness of its own mark, by way of the dharma-constituent, by way of suchness, by way of unaltered suchness,🔽by way of the nonerroneous suchness, and by way of the inalienable suchness is the emptiness of the bodhisattva great beings’ mass of dedications.

original: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa ni yang rab 'byor khyod legs so //
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis stong pa ni yang rab 'byor khyod legs so //
translated: “Subhūti, you are good at explaining the emptiness of the bodhisattva great beings’ mass of dedications.”

original: rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur ;
analyzed: rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur ;
translated: Subhūti, if all the sentient beings in the great billionfold world system were to attain the ten wholesome courses of action,

original: tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa snga thob par gyur na /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa snga thob par gyur na /
translated: the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the six superknowledges,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: de dag gis bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: de dag gis bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: Would the merit from that cause of theirs increase a lot?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
translated: “Blessed One, it would increase a lot.

original: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: Well-Gone One, it would increase a lot.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: “Subhūti, the merit of a son of family or daughter of family who dedicates their roots of virtue without attachment increases even more than that.

original: rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas na rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti, therefore, a son of family or daughter of family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ni rab ces bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba ni rab ces bya'o //
translated: The dedication of the roots of virtue of that son or daughter of good family is called supreme.

original: dam pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called excellent.

original: gtso bo zhes bya'o //🔽mchog ces bya'o //🔽rab mchog ces bya'o //
analyzed: gtso bo zhes bya'o // mchog ces bya'o // rab mchog ces bya'o //
translated: It is called foremost.🔽It is called best.🔽It is called sublime.

original: phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called unsurpassed.

original: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is called unequalled.

original: gong na med pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chung du yin no //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chung du yin no //
translated: This is the lesser dedication that gives rise to great merit.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur /
translated: “Moreover, Subhūti, all the beings there are in this billion-fold world system have become stream entrants,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par gyur te /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom par gyur te /
translated: once-returners, non-returners, and worthy ones.

original: de dag thams cad la yang @124a * //
analyzed: de dag thams cad la yang @124a * //
translated: And all of them

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: are sons or daughters of good family🔽who have set out for full awakening to unsurpassed, perfect buddhahood.

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas /
translated: If some son or daughter of good family were to serve with robes, alms-food, bedding, seats, remedies for exhaustion, and medicinal herbs for as long as they live,

original: bla mar byas /🔽bsti stang du byas /
analyzed: bla mar byas / bsti stang du byas /
translated: and to revere,

original: mchod par byas na /
analyzed: mchod par byas na /
translated: honor, and worship them,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: what do you think, Subhūti,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: would that son of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: or daughter of good family generate a lot of merit on the basis of that cause?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
translated: “Blessed One, it would be a lot.

original: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: Well-Gone One, it would be a lot.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: The Blessed One said,🔽“Subhūti, a son of good family

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pha med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pha med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo //
translated: or daughter of good family who dedicates roots of virtue in this way, without attachment, would generate even more merit than that.”

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur te /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, if all the sentient beings in the great trichiliocosm were to become pratyekabuddhas,

original: rang sangs rgyas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas de dag la rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and if some son of a good family or daughter of a good family were to honor those pratyekabuddhas

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byas /
translated: with many articles of Dharma robes, alms-food, bedding, and medicines for the sick,

original: bla mar byas /🔽bsti stang du byas /
analyzed: bla mar byas / bsti stang du byas /
translated: and were to revere them,🔽and were to respect them,

original: mchod par byas na /
analyzed: mchod par byas na /
translated: and were to make offerings to them,

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /🔽rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems / rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam ;
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam ;
translated: Would that son of a good family or daughter of a good family generate a lot of merit on that basis?

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
translated: “Blessed One, it would be a lot.

original: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: Well-Gone One, it would be a lot.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: “Subhūti, a son of a good family or daughter of a good family who teaches this Dharma teaching of The White Lotus of the Good Dharma to others,

original: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba 'bring po
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba 'bring po
translated: This is the medium dedication that gives rise to great merit.

original: yin no // rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: yin no // rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te /
translated: Moreover, Subhūti, if all the sentient beings in a world system consisting of a triple-thousand great one-thousand worlds were to enter into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,🔽and if all the sentient beings in the eastern direction, as many as there are, in world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges river, were to give Dharma robes, alms-food,

original: de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
analyzed: de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
translated: beds, and medicines for the sick to each and every bodhisattva-mahāsattva, and were to attend to them with all requisites for as many eons as there are sands in the Ganges river, and if they were to dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, would they on that account generate a lot of merit?🔽 Subhūti said, Very much, Bhagavan! Very much, Sugata!🔽The Bhagavān said, Therefore, Subhūti, a son of a good family or a daughter of a good family who has entered into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening should not dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening by way of apprehending something.

original: mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos @124b bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /🔽bla mar byas /
analyzed: mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos @124b bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas / bla mar byas /
translated: They would serve them for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River with bedding, medicine for sickness, and many provisions.🔽They would venerate them,

original: bsti stang du byas /
analyzed: bsti stang du byas /
translated: respect them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: make offerings to them,🔽and honor them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung ga bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang chos gos dang /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung ga bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang chos gos dang /
translated: In the same way, all the sentient beings in as many world systems as there are atoms in the rose apple-shaped world, in the ten directions, in the eastern direction alone, in as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River, would serve each bodhisattva-mahāsattva with Dharma robes,

original: bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas /🔽bla mar byas /🔽bsti stang du byas /
analyzed: bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad mang pos bskal pa gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas / bla mar byas / bsti stang du byas /
translated: alms-food, bedding, medicine for sickness, and many provisions for as many eons as there are grains of sand in the Ganges River.🔽They would venerate them,🔽respect them,

original: mchod par byas te /
analyzed: mchod par byas te /
translated: make offerings to them,🔽and honor them with all the necessities of happiness.

original: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na /
analyzed: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na /
translated: and with all the requisites of happiness.

original: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems /
translated: What do you think, Subhūti,

original: rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: would those sons of a good family or🔽daughters of a good family on account of that cause

original: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam /
translated: generate a lot of merit?”

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti replied,

original: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
translated: “A lot, Bhagavat,

original: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
translated: a lot, Sugata.

original: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad ma mchis /🔽grangs ma mchis /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar tshad ma mchis / grangs ma mchis /
translated: Bhagavat, it is like this: it is immeasurable,🔽it is innumerable,

original: gzhal du ma mchis te /
analyzed: gzhal du ma mchis te /
translated: it is incomparable,

original: bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dper bgyi ba yang dka'o //
analyzed: bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dper bgyi ba yang dka'o //
translated: and it is difficult to take as an example that thing that generates merit.

original: bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de gzugs can zhig lags na ni de thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de gzugs can zhig lags na ni de thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Bhagavat, if that thing that generates merit were a form, then it would not fit into all the world systems as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.”

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavat said to the venerable Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor legs so legs so //
translated: “Excellent, Subhūti, excellent!

original: rab 'byor khyod legs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor khyod legs so //
translated: “Excellent, Subhūti!

original: khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te /🔽rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: khyod kyis ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te / rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is just as you have said.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te /🔽rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te / rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: Subhūti, a son of good family or a daughter of good family who dedicates roots of virtue in this way, with a dedication free of attachment, to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening will create even more merit.

original: rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i ba'i rtsa pa yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rab ces bya'o //🔽dam ba zhes bya'o //🔽gtso bo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i ba'i rtsa pa yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rab ces bya'o // dam ba zhes bya'o // gtso bo zhes bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, the dedication of roots of virtue by a son of good family or a daughter of good family in this way is called the best,🔽it is called the highest,

original: mchog ces bya'o //🔽rab mchog ces bya'o //🔽phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: mchog ces bya'o // rab mchog ces bya'o // phul du phyin pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the foremost,🔽it is called the most excellent,🔽it is called the supreme,

original: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gong na med pa zhes bya'o //
translated: it is called the unsurpassed,🔽it is called the unequalled,

original: bla na med pa zhes bya'o /
analyzed: bla na med pa zhes bya'o /
translated: it is called the incomparable.

original: rab 'byor chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams snga ma @125a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams snga ma @125a * //
translated: Subhūti, compared to the mass of merit of the merit of this dedication free of attachment, the previous merit

original: des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //🔽stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /
analyzed: des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o // stong gi cha dang / brgya stong gi cha dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba brgya'i cha dang / bye ba stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang /
translated: It does not approach even a hundredth part of it.

original: dpe dang / zla dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do //
analyzed: dpe dang / zla dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do //
translated: It does not approach even a thousandth part, a hundred thousandth part, a ten millionth part, a billionth part, a ten billionth part, a trillionth part, a hundred trillionth part, a count, a fraction, a comparison, an illustration, or an example of it.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is because those sons of a good family or

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur ba de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur ba dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur ba de dag dmigs pa'i 'du shes can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: those daughters of a good family who have the ten wholesome actions, who have the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the five clairvoyances, have a perception of an object.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: It is because those sons of a good family or🔽those daughters of a good family who have the ten wholesome actions, who have the four concentrations, the four immeasurables, the four formless absorptions, and the five clairvoyances, have a perception of an object.

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang sems can de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i bar du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang sems can de dag thams cad rgyun du zhugs par gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa'i bar du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang /
translated: and all beings were to become worthy ones, and all beings were to become solitary buddhas, and were to serve them with Dharma robes, alms-food, bedding,

original: nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed /🔽bla mar byed /
analyzed: nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad mang pos rim gror byed / bla mar byed /
translated: medicinal herbs, and various necessities,🔽and were to venerate them,

original: bsti stang du byed /
analyzed: bsti stang du byed /
translated: revere them,

original: mchod par byed cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur ba de ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can te /
analyzed: mchod par byed cing bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bar 'gyur ba de ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can te /
translated: and make offerings to them, and were to serve them with all the requisites for happiness,

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror byed /🔽bla mar byed /🔽bsti stang du byed /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror byed / bla mar byed / bsti stang du byed /
translated: they would still be conceptualizing.🔽Because those who serve, venerate, revere,🔽and make offerings to bodhisattvas are conceptualizing.”

original: mchod par byed pa de dag ni dmigs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chen po yin no //
analyzed: mchod par byed pa de dag ni dmigs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsod nams chen po 'byung ba'i yongs su bsngo ba chen po yin no //
translated: This is the great dedication of the great merit that arises.

original: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi /
translated: Then the four great kings

original: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dag thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dag thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Twenty thousand sons of the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings, with their hands together in homage, bowed to the Blessed One and said:

original: kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: “Blessed One, in that way, with skill in means, they dedicate those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in a way that is not dualistic,

original: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: in a way that is not nondualistic. That is the great dedication of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'grogs te /
analyzed: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang 'grogs te /
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Gods, together with the gods of the Heaven of the Thirty-Three,

original: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba @125b dang ; byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnams brdung zhing /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba @125b dang ; byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang po dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo rnams brdung zhing /
translated: made offerings to the Blessed One with many divine flowers, incense, garlands, ointments, powders, clothes, parasols, victory banners, and flags, and with the sounds of divine music.

original: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces tshig brjod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces tshig brjod do //
translated: Then they spoke this verse:

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis dmigs su ma mchis ba'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis dmigs su ma mchis ba'i tshul dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: “Blessed One, by this skillful means, you dedicate those roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening in a way that is free of reference points, free of attachment, and free of signs, so that they do not become two.

original: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: This dedication is the great dedication of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / rab dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te /
analyzed: de nas lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang / rab dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te /
translated: Then the gods Suyāma, Saṃtuṣita, Sunirmita, and Vaśavartin, together with many thousands of gods,

original: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad kyi tshig brjod do //
translated: addressed the Blessed One with these words:

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar thabs mkhas pa gang yin pa 'dis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang / bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: “Blessed One, in this way, through this skillful means, without reference point, without signs, and without activity, you dedicate those roots of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, so that they do not become two.

original: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chen po dang ldan pa'o //
translated: That dedication is the great dedication of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de nas tshangs 'khor gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas /
analyzed: de nas tshangs 'khor gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas /
translated: Then many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of Brahmakāyika gods came to where the Lord was,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te /🔽bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te / bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: and having bowed their heads at the Lord’s feet,

original: rigs kyi bu mo gang snga ma dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo gang snga ma dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so //
translated: they said this to the Lord: “Lord, it is amazing how those bodhisattva great beings who have been taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means surpass the wholesome roots of those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who previously have been practicing the practice of the perfection of wisdom without skillful means.🔽They let loose a cry and made a shout:🔽“Lord, it is amazing how those bodhisattva great beings who have been taken hold of by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means surpass the wholesome roots of those sons of a good family or daughters of a good family who previously have been practicing the practice of the perfection of wisdom without skillful means.”

original: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang /🔽'bras bu che ba dang / gnas @126a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas @126a * //
translated: Brahmakāyika, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Anabhraka, Puṇyaprasava,

original: gtsang ma dang / 'og min pa yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas /
analyzed: gtsang ma dang / 'og min pa yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas /
translated: Bṛhatphala, Śuddhāvāsa, and Akaniṣṭha gods came to where the Bhagavān was,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: and having bowed their heads at the Bhagavān’s feet,

original: bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu'am /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su gzung ba de dag gis rigs kyi bu'am /
translated: they said to the Bhagavān, ‘Bhagavān, in that way the bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are sustained by the perfection of wisdom and skillful means will be sons of noble family or🔽daughters of noble family.

original: rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so //
analyzed: rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgrags so //
translated: “It is amazing how the roots of virtue of those sons and daughters of good family who practice with reference points are outshone!”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to the sons of the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm and the sons of the gods of the Śuddhāvāsa realm:

original: lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te /
analyzed: lha'i bu dag gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te /
translated: “Sons of gods, if all the sentient beings in the great trichiliocosm were to enter into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: de dag thams cad kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas sems dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /
translated: All of them should rejoice in the roots of virtue of all the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas of the past, present, and future, together with their hearers and solitary buddhas, from the time when they first gave rise to the mind of awakening up until they fully awakened to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood,🔽from the time when they fully awakened to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood up until they passed into the realm of nirvāṇa without any remainder of the aggregates,

original: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / nyan thos de dag dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /
translated: and from the time when the sacred Dharma disappeared. They should rejoice in the roots of virtue of all those blessed buddhas, hearers, and solitary buddhas.

original: de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: de dag las gzhan pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: and the roots of virtue of all other sentient beings that arise from the perfection of generosity, and likewise the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ; shes rab kyi phung po dang /
